name: SNAP (Liberto)
description:
This is Snap

A game where you guide a little cube through a desert bank, exploring the three floors and finding various items in order to progress until you open the vault and steal the most important treasure (it's not gold ;]).
 After you'll start knowing the items you'll find the most efficient route to the end. There are multiple objects with the same function, but some are better than others.

 This is our first gamejam, we didn't realize how little time we had so the game is incomplete, the models are pretty awful and entire sections of the game have been removes. 
Anyway we really enjoyed making our first game together and we can't wait to repeat this amazing experience (applying everything we've learned this time).

CONTROLS 

WASD - Move

E - Pick the highlighted item

Q - Drop the selected item 

Spacebar - Use the selected item 

1 - Select the 1st inventory slot 

2 - Select the 2nd inventory slot
